SEARCH

Class PaddingOracleAttack

java.lang.Object
PaddingOracleAttack
public class PaddingOracleAttack extends Object
The PaddingOracleAttack class implements a Padding Oracle attack on ciphertext encrypted with a block cipher (e.g., AES in CBC mode). It uses a padding oracle to iteratively guess the plaintext by testing different attack vectors for each block of ciphertext. The attack proceeds block by block, exploiting the oracle's feedback on padding validity.

Usage:

  pad_oracle oracle = new pad_oracle(); // Example oracle implementation
  PaddingOracleAttack attack = new PaddingOracleAttack(oracle);
  String decryptedText = attack.paddingOracleAttack(cipherText, oracle);

Methods:

  • paddingOracleAttack(String, pad_oracle) - Main method for performing the attack.
  • getDecryptedValue(long, int) - Computes the decrypted value for a block.
  • buildAttackVector(long, String, int) - Builds the attack vector for the oracle query.
  • xorAndRebuild(String, int) - A helper method used by buildAttackVector(long, String, int) to rebuild the attack vector by XOR-ing the decrypted text with the expected block padding.

Author: Bruno Ramirez Ledesma

  • Method Details

    • paddingOracleAttack

      public static String paddingOracleAttack(String cipherText, pad_oracle oracle)
      Performs a Padding Oracle attack on the given cipher text using the provided oracle. It attempts to decrypt the cipher text by making iterative guesses for each block.
      Parameters:
      cipherText - the cipher text to be decrypted
      oracle - the Padding Oracle instance used to check the validity of padding
      Returns:
      the decrypted text after all blocks have been processed

    • getDecryptedValue

      private static String getDecryptedValue(long attackValue, int blockIndex)
      Calculates the decrypted value for a given attack value and block index. The decrypted value is obtained by XOR-ing the attack value with the expected padding for the block.
      Parameters:
      attackValue - the current attack value (XOR-ed with block padding)
      blockIndex - the current block index being processed
      Returns:
      the decrypted value for the given block

    • buildAttackVector

      private static String buildAttackVector(long attackValue, String decryptedText, int blockIndex)
      Builds the attack vector used in the Padding Oracle attack. This vector includes the current attack value and the previously decrypted text, XOR-ed with the expected padding for the block.
      Parameters:
      attackValue - the current attack value for the block
      decryptedText - the already decrypted text (used for constructing the attack vector)
      blockIndex - the current block index being processed
      Returns:
      the formatted attack vector used to query the oracle

    • xorAndRebuild

      public static String xorAndRebuild(String decryptedText, int blockIndex)
      Rebuilds the attack vector by XOR-ing the decrypted text with the expected block padding. Each byte of the decrypted text is XOR-ed with the padding for the current block.
      Parameters:
      decryptedText - the decrypted text up to the current block
      blockIndex - the current block index being processed
      Returns:
      the rebuilt string used to generate the attack vector
